mapper.select: SELECT td.todo_id as todoId , td.what_todo as whatTodo , td.status as status , TO_CHAR(td.update_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as updateDate , TO_CHAR(td.insert_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as insertDate , td.dbsts as dbsts , tf.ref_seq as refSeq , tf.todo_id as todoId2 , tf.what_todo as whatTodo2 , TO_CHAR(tf.insert_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as insertDate2 , tf.parent_todo_id as parentTodoId , tf.status as status2 FROM ( SELECT tx.todo_id , tx.what_todo , tx.status , tx.update_date , tx.insert_date , tx.dbsts FROM k_todo_list tx WHERE tx.dbsts = 'N' ORDER BY tx.todo_id desc LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow} ) as td LEFT JOIN ( SELECT trf.ref_seq , trf.todo_id , trf.insert_date , trf.parent_todo_id , ktl.what_todo , ktl.status FROM k_todo_ref_list trf join k_todo_list ktl on (trf.parent_todo_id = ktl.todo_id) ) as tf on (td.todo_id = tf.todo_id)

SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM k_todo_list as td WHERE td.dbsts = 'N'
AND td.what_todo = #{whatTodo}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM k_todo_list WHERE dbsts = 'N' AND status = 'I' AND todo_id in ( SELECT tr.parent_todo_id FROM k_todo_ref_list as tr WHERE tr.todo_id = #{todoId} )

SELECT td.todo_id as todoId , td.what_todo as whatTodo , td.status as status , TO_CHAR(td.update_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as updateDate , TO_CHAR(td.insert_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as insertDate , td.dbsts as dbsts , (CASE WHEN k2.todo_id IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS refYn FROM K_TODO_LIST as td left join ( SELECT kt2.TODO_ID FROM K_TODO_LIST kt2 where TODO_ID in ( select parent_todo_id from K_TODO_REF_LIST where todo_id = #{todoId} ) ) as k2 on(td.TODO_ID = k2.TODO_ID) WHERE td.todo_id != #{todoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO K_TODO_LIST ( what_todo , status , insert_date , dbsts ) VALUES ( #{whatTodo} , 'I' , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , 'N' )
